parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns how many seconds injured unit will continue leaving blood trail. If unit damage is < 0.1, the return value is 0 and unit doesn't leave any blood trail. Use [[setBleedingRemaining]] to set different remaining time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getBleedingRemaining''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bleedingRemaining = [[getBleedingRemaining]] _unit;
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isBurning]], [[setBleedingRemaining]], [[isBleeding]]
</value></part></template></root>
